bwwExcerpt: Yes, it’s kid-friendly. Yes, it’s visually slick. But it’s also toothless. A show about a boundary-pushing cartoon icon shouldn’t feel this safe or generic. Betty Boop may be ready for her close-up, but this isn’t the vehicle she deserves. You are better off watching the original animated shorts on YouTube.

keyPhrases.quote: this isn't the vehicle she deserves
You are better off watching the original animated shorts on YouTube
